title: golden champ ashe
body: so i bought the worlds pass as soon as it was available however i didnt get the champ ashe skin. i also noticed that in the worlds loot thing from the tokens is a chroma skin for it so i decided id go ahead and try for that well 2 weeks later and i now have enough token to purchase the chroma and ward skins, right. well i only got the ward. did something change since like riot trist or does chroma's maybe not work the same way as where even if you dont own that specific skin if you get the chroma for it it immediately gets unlocked or was this maybe changed? that was my train of thought before i obviously ran straight into a brick wall and now i feel as if i just wasted 320 of the tokens. and hell i would have wasted 120 if i went for the border too. i mean dont get me wrong when i can im going to buy the skin as soon as possible since i just have to waste more money on a game that ive already dumped well over a thousand dollars on. but yeah for just that golden chroma ima be dumping close to what 2675 rp? or give or take 20 bucks? does that seem right?

replies.body: The mission pass offers additional missions to get more tokens, which you can use to get the chroma, ward, icon, and border.  The skin does not come with the pass though.  It's okay if you unlocked the chroma, but it won't be possible to use it until her skin is unlocked as well.  More [info here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot), sorry for the confusion!
